title:
Why did they put in a short stretch of bike lane on at 1602 South Front Street?

It eliminated a second lane that gave easy access to Burnett St. and on to River Road. Now with the traffic coming off the bridge, the back up it terrible.

I travel there at least twice a week and have never seen a bike there.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=12984
